description:
Job Description

Job Description

Join a forward-thinking financial conglomerate and be at the forefront of innovation in the industry. We're seeking a Machine Learning Developer to be part of our dynamic team. If you're a Python enthusiast or an adept programmer with a passion for data-driven decision-making, we want to talk to you.

Job Description:

Position Overview:

As a Machine Learning Developer, you'll be a valuable member of our team, working on projects that span from infrastructure development to cutting-edge modeling. The ideal candidate is someone with strong coding abilities and a solid foundation in mathematics, computer science, statistics, or machine learning. If you have an entrepreneurial spirit, a collaborative mindset, and a hunger for professional growth, we'd love to meet you.

• Engage in a mix of infrastructure work (25%) and modeling (75%).
• Handle projects in various ML disciplines, including Natural Language Processing (NLP), unstructured data analysis, predictive modeling, and classic machine learning.
• Collaborate with a two-person team and liaise with different stakeholders within the organization.
• Contribute to the growth and success of the team and the firm.

Qualifications:
• Strong coding skills, preferably in Python or a similar programming language.
• Solid background in mathematics, computer science, statistics, or machine learning.
• A proactive and entrepreneurial mindset.
• Preferred:At least 2 years of professional work experience.
• Experience in ML disciplines, particularly in NLP, unstructured data analysis, predictive modeling, or classic machine learning, is a significant advantage.

Application Process

The application process for the Machine Learning Developer position consists of three steps to ensure we find the best candidates:

Step 1: Introductory Call

The first step involves a 30-minute introductory call with the hiring manager. This is an opportunity for you to discuss your skills, experience, and aspirations, and to learn more about the role and the team.

Step 2: Coding Algorithm Test

If you successfully pass the introductory call, the second step is a coding algorithm test. You will be provided with a coding challenge to assess your problem-solving and programming skills. This test helps us understand your practical abilities and how well you can apply your knowledge to real-world scenarios.

Step 3: Coding Interview

In the third step, we will conduct a coding portion of the interview to evaluate your development skills in more depth. This interview is designed to ensure that your coding and development skills meet our standards and align with the responsibilities of the role.

We encourage all qualified applicants to take the first step and schedule an introductory call. Join our innovative team and demonstrate your development skills to make a significant impact in the financial industry.

To schedule your introductory call and advance to the next steps, please send your resume and a brief introduction.

Cypress Group is committed to diversity and inclusion in the workplace. We appreciate the interest of all applicants and will contact candidates who advance to the coding interview phase.

description:
**COMPANY DESCRIPTIONS:** 
  

 Established in year 2000, Monda Window and Door Systems is a manufacturer located in Corona, NY, specialized in custom\\-designed window and door products in vinyl and aluminum systems. We have a full line of double hung, slider, casement, awning , hopper, picture, bow/bay and architectural shape windows. We also offer sliding doors, terrace doors, storefronts, entrances doors, shower doors, mirrors, glass railing, ...etc.
   

  



  



**JOB DESCRIPTIONS:** 
  

 As the Production Plant Manager, you will be responsible for managing, directing, and leading plant window production activities in accordance with established manufacturing policies and procedures. Provide leadership to front line supervisors and operators to ensure safety, quality, production efficiencies and delivery are met. Maintain plant cost effectiveness by coordination of all production departments toward fulfillment of annual goals and standards. Implement window product production schedules, parameters, programs, standard operating procedures (SOPs) and monitors same for compliance and progress. 
   

  



  

**RESPONSIBILITIES:** 


 ●        Monitor the daily production schedule of vinyl and aluminum window products, ensuring the daily schedule is met at the desired levels of quality and delivery standards with optimum efficiency.
   

  



 ●        Make sure safety standards and values are understood and followed, ensuring a safe working environment. Establish and facilitate departmental procedures which in turn enhance production and efficiency of each department while supporting safety policies and procedures.
   

  



 ●        Along with staff and Engineering, ensure that continuous improvement activities related to both process and quality are in place and active in all production departments.
   

  



 ●        Supervise the mechanic and coordinate tasks that are needed to ensure equipment’s optimum performance and minimum downtime (e.g. equipment preventive maintenance, repair logs, spare parts management…etc.) 
   

  



 ●        Initiate and implement procedures/processes to conserve material and eliminate waste.
   

  



 ●        Periodic review of the production SOPs to ensure accuracy and efficiency. Assist engineer in developing new SOPs as needed.
   

  



 ●        With assistances from the Human Resources Dept, ensure that recruitment, hiring, assignment and termination of personnel is in line with business demands and consistent with corporate policies and governmental regulations.
   

  



 ●        Maintain positive associate relations through fair and consistent application of company policies and procedures.
   

  



 ●        Evaluate subordinate personnel for management potential and coordinates developmental activities with Human Resources to ensure progression.
   

  



 ●        Prepare annual manufacturing/production labor information for forecasts and budgets.
   

  



 ●        Complete and review daily, weekly and monthly reporting of operating metrics. Generate daily production meeting minutes.
   

  



 ●        Monitor manpower requirements. Plan and establish utilization targets to realize most efficient use of available manpower and facilities. Monitor and ensure adequate capacity and adjust to match demand.
   

  



 ●        Coordinate and monitor compliance with customer and company product specifications and standards to ensure the manufacture of quality product.
   

  



 ●        Implement monthly inventory counts, monitor and maintain all raw material inventories.
   

  



 ●        Perform other duties as assigned.
   

  



 Note: The above list is not all inclusive and additional responsibilities may be assigned. 
   

  



  

**REQUIREMENTS:** 


 ●       
 **5\\+ years of industrial plant management experience is a MUST.**
  



 ●       
 **Must be able to communicate in Mandarin Chinese (speak/read/write).**
  



 ●        Bachelor’s degree preferred or equivalent combination of education/experience required.
   

  



 ●        Comprehensive knowledge of vinyl and aluminum window manufacturing systems and techniques preferred.
   

  



 ●        Highly developed oral and written communication skills required with all levels of the organization.
   

  



 ●        Proficient knowledge of Lean Manufacturing practices such as Kaizen, 5S, DFT, etc.
   

  



 ●        Financial and budgeting knowledge. Knowledge of engineering processes, information technologies, and human resource functions to enable accessing these resources as needed to support manufacturing operations. Working knowledge of plant equipment and systems.
   

  



 ●        Expertise in project management, organization, and efficiency.
   

  



 ●        Confident and solid leadership skills.
   

  



 ●        High motivational and inspirational skills.
   

  



 ●        Solid problem solving, thinking, and reasoning skills.
   

  



 ●        Ability to handle responsibility and pressure of meeting deadlines.
   

  



 ●        Teamworking. Attention to detail. Self\\-starter/initiative.
   

  

 ●        Proficient in Microsoft Office software.
